participant_1.background:
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
i recently had a private lunch with will ferrell.
I'm not a weather person.
I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what.
I enjoy photographing nature and my pets.

participant_2.background:
I'm still paying off my student loans, so I don't own a home yet.
I'm a creative person who enjoys using my imagination to create new things.
i want to put my photos to a music video staring adam levin.
My garden is my most prized possession.
My four daughters are my pride and joy.

content.text: What are you up to today?
I'm doing some gardening. I love being outside and working with my hands!
Gardening is great! I have a lot of fun taking pictures of nature and my pets.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not very good at taking pictures, but I do enjoy looking at them.
What are some of your favorite photos?
I have a few of my daughters that I really like. They're growing up so fast!
That's great! I'd love to see them sometime.
Sure, I'll send you some! What do you do for fun?
I enjoy watching The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs. I recently had a private lunch with Will Ferrell.
That's awesome! I've heard great things about The Repair Shop. I'm not a weather person, but I'd love to have lunch with Adam Levine.
He's a great singer! I'd love to put my photos to a music video starring him.
That would be amazing! I'm sure your photos would be beautiful.
Thank you! I'm glad you think so.
